SEARCH
Package com.manager

Class Provider

java.lang.Object
com.manager.Person
com.manager.Provider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Person>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Doctor, Technician
public abstract class Provider extends Person
Abstract class representing a provider with a location. This class extends Person and serves as a base for specific provider types. It includes an abstract method for determining the rate per visit.
